titles.title: Indian Pueblo Cultural Center Clarification Act
Indian Pueblo Cultural Center Clarification Act
Indian Pueblo Cultural Center Clarification Act
Indian Pueblo Cultural Center Clarification Act
Indian Pueblo Cultural Center Clarification Act
Indian Pueblo Cultural Center Clarification Act
To amend Public Law 95-232 to repeal a restriction on treating as Indian country certain lands held in trust for Indian pueblos in New Mexico.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 111-515.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 295.

action.text: Mr. Heinrich moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 4445.

At the conclusion of debate, the chair put the question on the motion to suspend the rules. Mr. Heinrich objected to the vote on the grounds that a quorum was not present. Further proceedings on the motion were postponed. The point of no quorum was withdrawn.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by recorded vote (2/3 required): 411 - 0 (Roll no. 414).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported by Senator Dorgan without amendment. With written report No. 111-379.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 720.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 1/4/2011--Public Law. Indian Pueblo Cultural Center Clarification Act - Repeals a restriction on treating as Indian country certain lands held in trust for Indian pueblos within Albuquerque, Bernalillo County, New Mexico. Prohibits gaming on such land.
